official_title: A bill to increase the size of the Big Thicket National Preserve in the State of Texas by adding the Village Creek Corridor unit, the Big Sandy Corridor unit, and the Canyonlands unit.
short_title: Big Thicket National Preserve Addition Act of 1987

summary.text: Big Thicket National Preserve Addition Act of 1987 - Increases the size of the Big Thicket National Preserve, Texas, through the addition of specified lands.

titles.title: Big Thicket National Preserve Addition Act of 1987
A bill to increase the size of the Big Thicket National Preserve in the State of Texas by adding the Village Creek Corridor unit, the Big Sandy Corridor unit, and the Canyonlands unit.
